content: This PR is now fully ready for the big leagues, if people could give it one last review (it's been previously delegated but a lot of changes have happened since...)
(also, this is relevant to lean4 - I don't think the diamond would resolve itself in lean4, contrary to expectations that eta was gonna fix things here!)
Note that #outofsync is currently rather overloaded due to #18848 (which was done to help with porting), so probably we shouldn't merge this yet even if it is ready
This doesn't touch any ported file now, so I guess we can ignore #outofsync
This looks nice and clean now, thanks! I pushed a small golf, and requested some clarification in some comments. Otherwise, LGTM!
:ping_pong:
My approval was intended to mean "consider this d+'d", unless you think it needs another review since then
cool, just wanted to be sure because it had been a while :)
